title: Three roads to tomorrow
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Nigeria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Africa, West - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Petroleum industry and trade
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Developing countries - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Africa, West - Social conditions
description: A story of the journey of three Nigerian students between their homes and Ibadan University. The three boys live far apart in the three regions of this vast country. The film is designed to show what Nigeria is like today and to illustrate the help which oil power (BP) is giving to the development of the country and its standard of living.
